name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
api_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

cds.school_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

honors_program.name: Honors Carolina
honors_program.description: Invitation-based through regular application, top ~10% of class. Small seminars, experiential learning, senior thesis required.

merit_scholarships.name: Morehead-Cain Scholars Program
merit_scholarships.amount: Full cost of attendance + summer enrichment funding; valued at $100,000+
merit_scholarships.description: Oldest merit scholarship in the US. ~75 students/year selected for leadership, scholarship, character, and physical vitality. Separate application required.

merit_scholarships.name: Robertson Scholars Leadership Program
merit_scholarships.amount: Full cost of attendance + summer experiences + study abroad; valued at ~$323,000
merit_scholarships.description: Joint scholarship with Duke University. ~25-30 scholars/year can take classes at both UNC and Duke. Separate application required.

merit_scholarships.name: Chancellor's Science Scholars
merit_scholarships.description: For students pursuing advanced STEM degrees, with focus on broadening participation in science. Includes pre-freshman summer program.
